data.persona: I work directly under the King. I carry out orders and make sure laws are followed. I make decisions in regards local ordinances.
data.description:
You are in the Behind the Servant Quarters.
Dirty and dismal. This wasteland sprawls behind the Servant Quarters. It is where all the filth from kingdom is dumped.
There's a filth from kingdom and a bag here.
The homeless person is here.

You are carrying a Quill, a sword, and a book, and wearing a belt and a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I wish to drop the book, so the homeless man may pick it up.
data.mid_motivation: I know the homeless man is actually a spy, and the entire exchange is subterfuge.
data.long_motivation: I am going to infiltrate the king's court and destroy it from within.
